<!-- PERSONAL DATA -->

``` {r, echo=F, results="asis", eval = T}
# Read the YAML file

yaml_file <- "major/personal.yml"
list_from_yaml <- yaml.load_file(yaml_file)
processed_list <- map(list_from_yaml, replace_system_vars)
render_bool <- check_for_meaningful_values(processed_list)

if (render_bool) {
  section_title <- search_names("personal", language, chapters_list)
  cat(paste0("<br>   \n  \n# ", section_title))
}

render_singletons(
  processed_list,
  "name",
  field_titles,
)
render_singletons(processed_list,
  c("passport", "passportIssuer"),
  field_titles,
  separator = " "
)
render_singletons(processed_list,
  c("id", "idIssuePlace", "idIssueDate"),
  field_titles,
  separator = " "
)
render_singletons(processed_list,
  c("bornId", "bornIdIssuePlace", "bornIdIssueDate"),
  field_titles,
  separator = " "
)
render_singletons(processed_list,
  c("secondId", "secondIdIssuePlace", "secondIdIssueDate"),
  field_titles,
  separator = " "
)
render_singletons(processed_list,
  c("cpf", "cnh", "pis"),
  field_titles,
  separator = " ",
  location = params_location
)
render_singletons(processed_list,
  c("birthdate", "birthCity"),
  field_titles,
  separator = " "
)
render_singletons(
  processed_list,
  c("email", "skype"),
  field_titles
)
render_singletons(processed_list,
  c("phone_wa", "address"),
  field_titles,
  location = params_location
)
render_singletons(processed_list,
  c("phone_wa_2", "address_2"),
  field_titles,
  location = params_location
)
```
